News Application

Forms Documentation

This section documents all the Django forms in the News Application.

Forms Module

Forms for news application with validation and user-friendly interfaces.

class news.forms.ArticleApprovalForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, instance=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)[source]

Bases: ModelForm

Form for editors to approve articles with status control.

This form allows editors to approve or reject articles by setting the status and approval flag. It provides a clean interface for the approval workflow.

Parameters:

  • status (ChoiceField) – Article status selection field

  • is_approved (BooleanField) – Boolean checkbox for approval status

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

Meta options for ArticleApprovalForm.

fields = ['status', 'is_approved']
model

alias of Article

widgets = {'is_approved': <django.forms.widgets.CheckboxInput object>, 'status': <django.forms.widgets.Select object>}
base_fields = {'is_approved': <django.forms.fields.BooleanField object>, 'status': <django.forms.fields.TypedChoiceField object>}
declared_fields = {}
property media

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

class news.forms.ArticleForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: ModelForm

Form for creating and editing articles with validation.

This form provides fields for article creation and editing by journalists. It includes title, content, summary, publisher, and category fields with Bootstrap styling and validation.

Parameters:

  • title (CharField) – Article title field with placeholder text

  • content (TextField) – Article content field with textarea widget

  • summary (TextField) – Optional article summary field

  • publisher (ModelChoiceField) – Publisher selection dropdown

  • category (ModelChoiceField) – Category selection dropdown

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

Meta options for ArticleForm.

fields = ['title', 'content', 'summary', 'publisher', 'category']
model

alias of Article

widgets = {'category': <django.forms.widgets.Select object>, 'content': <django.forms.widgets.Textarea object>, 'publisher': <django.forms.widgets.Select object>, 'summary': <django.forms.widgets.Textarea object>, 'title': <django.forms.widgets.TextInput object>}
base_fields = {'category': <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>, 'content': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'publisher': <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>, 'summary': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'title': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}
declared_fields = {}
property media

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

class news.forms.ResetPasswordForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, field_order=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None, bound_field_class=None)[source]

Bases: Form

Form for resetting password with token.

base_fields = {'new_password1': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'new_password2': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}
clean()[source]

Hook for doing any extra form-wide cleaning after Field.clean() has been called on every field. Any ValidationError raised by this method will not be associated with a particular field; it will have a special-case association with the field named ‘__all__’.

declared_fields = {'new_password1': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'new_password2': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}
property media

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

class news.forms.SubscriptionForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: ModelForm

Form for managing user subscriptions to publishers and journalists.

This form allows users to subscribe to either publishers or journalists. It includes validation to ensure only one type of subscription is selected and provides a clean interface for subscription management.

Parameters:

  • publisher (ModelChoiceField) – Publisher selection dropdown for subscription

  • journalist (ModelChoiceField) – Journalist selection dropdown for subscription

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

Meta options for SubscriptionForm.

fields = ['publisher', 'journalist']
model

alias of Subscription

widgets = {'journalist': <django.forms.widgets.Select object>, 'publisher': <django.forms.widgets.Select object>}
base_fields = {'journalist': <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>, 'publisher': <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>}
clean()[source]

Hook for doing any extra form-wide cleaning after Field.clean() has been called on every field. Any ValidationError raised by this method will not be associated with a particular field; it will have a special-case association with the field named ‘__all__’.

declared_fields = {}
property media

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

class news.forms.UserRegistrationForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: UserCreationForm

Custom user registration form with role selection and styling.

This form extends Django’s UserCreationForm to include role selection and additional user fields. It provides Bootstrap styling for form controls and validates user input for registration.

Parameters:

  • role (ChoiceField) – User role selection field with choices from User.ROLE_CHOICES

  • email (EmailField) – User email address field with email validation

  • first_name (CharField) – User’s first name, maximum 30 characters

  • last_name (CharField) – User’s last name, maximum 30 characters

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

Meta options for UserRegistrationForm.

fields = ('username', 'email', 'first_name', 'last_name', 'role', 'password1', 'password2')
model

alias of User

base_fields = {'email': <django.forms.fields.EmailField object>, 'first_name': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'last_name': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'password1': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'password2': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'role': <django.forms.fields.ChoiceField object>, 'username': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}
declared_fields = {'email': <django.forms.fields.EmailField object>, 'first_name': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'last_name': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'password1': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'password2': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'role': <django.forms.fields.ChoiceField object>}
property media

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

class news.forms.UserRegistrationForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: UserCreationForm

Custom user registration form with role selection and styling.

This form extends Django’s UserCreationForm to include role selection and additional user fields. It provides Bootstrap styling for form controls and validates user input for registration.

Parameters:

  • role (ChoiceField) – User role selection field with choices from User.ROLE_CHOICES

  • email (EmailField) – User email address field with email validation

  • first_name (CharField) – User’s first name, maximum 30 characters

  • last_name (CharField) – User’s last name, maximum 30 characters

This form provides fields for article creation and editing by journalists. It includes title, content, summary, publisher, and category fields with Bootstrap styling and validation.
